ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.integration

Class DatagramWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.integration.DatagramWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFrequency, IDevice, IOutDevice

    public class DatagramWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IOutDevice
    Write values from the ParameterStore to an UDP Port (e.g. for JSBSim). This functionality is driven by the output processing which is defined in the control loop.
    Author:
    pschatzmann
